content: I've created a plan with 3 steps to solve your request.

Here's a summary of the latest AI news:

**Robotics and Automation:**

*   **Coffee-Making Robots:** AI-powered robots are being developed to prepare coffee in busy kitchens, potentially ushering in a new generation of intelligent machines. ([https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/](https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/))
*   **Robotic Arm Control via Brain Signals:** Researchers have enabled a paralyzed man to control a robotic arm using a device that relays signals from his brain to a computer. ([https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/](https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/))
*   **Leaping Robots:** Development of robots that can stick landings, inspired by squirrels, for applications like search and rescue. ([https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/](https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/))

**AI and Wireless Technology:**

*   **AI-Powered Wireless Revolution:** Virginia Tech researchers are working on endowing wireless technologies with next-generation AI that can think and plan like humans. ([https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/](https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/))

**AI Model Updates and Applications:**

*   **Watermark Removal:** People are reportedly using Google's new AI model to remove watermarks from images. ([https://techcrunch.com/category/artificial-intelligence/](https://techcrunch.com/category/artificial-intelligence/))

**Other AI News:**

*   **AI Algorithm Improvement:** A new AI algorithm called Torque Clustering improves how AI systems independently learn and uncover patterns in data. ([https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/](https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/))

Sources:
- [Artificial Intelligence News -- ScienceDaily] (https://www.sciencedaily.com/news/computers_math/artificial_intelligence/)
- [AI News & Artificial Intelligence | TechCrunch] (https://techcrunch.com/category/artificial-intelligence/)
